text:
10 boring tasks AI does faster than you ever could. 

It make you feel dumb for doing them manually: 

1. gamma.app (for ugly slides)
→ The PowerPoint killer. 
→ Unmatched design taste. Done in 2 minutes.

2. canva.com (for no designer)
→ The most famous non-designer design tool. 
→ AI features getting better.

3. claude.ai (for blank page)
→ The best ChatGPT alternative for writing. 
→ Feels human. Feels different.

4. blink.new (for no coding)
→ Vibecoding for people who don't code. 
→ Prompt it like ChatGPT, build apps.

5. granola.ai (for meeting notes)
→ The best AI notetaker. Simple. 
→ And doesn't connect to the call (finally).

6. opus.pro (for replacing expensive editor)
→ Upload a YouTube link, get clips. 
→ Create 20-50 TikToks from one video.

7. notebooklm.google.com (for learning)
→ Upload courses. Get podcasts & quizzes.
→ Train on your sources. Can take 50 sources.

8. gemini.google.com (for no photo/video editor)
→ Nano-Banana-Pro for images. 
→ Veo-3 for videos. Both are insane.

9. wispr.ai (for yapping out ideas in words)
→ Write with your voice. Crazy fast. 
→ Keeps learning from your edits.

10. grok.com (for fast & correct news)
→ The best way to search Twitter. 
→ That alone makes it worth it.

You're not slow. 
You're just doing stuff AI should be doing.

Pick one. Try it today.
